coffee-1.title: Saigon Black Coffee
coffee-1.description: Strong flavor of pure coffee with moderate bitterness, perfect for a wonderful morning.

coffee-2.title: Saigon Milk Coffee
coffee-2.description: Perfect combination of strong coffee and creamy condensed milk, creating a harmonious and delicious taste.

coffee-3.title: Salt Coffee
coffee-3.description: Coffee aroma combined with a touch of sea salt, creating a unique flavor that reduces bitterness and enhances taste.

coffee-4.title: Coconut Coffee
coffee-4.description: Wonderful combination of coffee and fresh coconut milk, creating a sweet, creamy and refreshing flavor.

coffee-5.title: Avocado Coffee
coffee-5.description: A special coffee with soft, creamy avocado cream on top, perfectly combined with the bitterness of coffee.

coffee-6.title: Coffee extra milk
coffee-6.description: A drink originating from Chinese with a harmonious combination of coffee, condensed milk and fresh milk, rich sweet taste.

coffee-7.title: Cocoa
coffee-7.description: A drink made from pure cocoa powder, delicious and nutritious, can be enjoyed hot or cold.

milk-tea-1.title: Traditional Milk Tea
milk-tea-1.description: Rich black tea flavor combined with milk creates a creamy, delicious drink with chewy pearls.

milk-tea-2.title: Green Thai Milk Tea
milk-tea-2.description: Distinctive Thai green tea flavor combined with milk, delivering a refreshing and sweet taste.

milk-tea-3.title: Red Thai Milk Tea
milk-tea-3.description: Unique flavor from Thai red tea, combined with milk creating beautiful colors and delicious taste.

milk-tea-4.title: Taro Milk Tea
milk-tea-4.description: Mild sweet and creamy taro flavor combined with milk tea creates a delicious and nutritious drink.

milk-tea-5.title: Roasted Rice Milk Tea
milk-tea-5.description: Special flavor from roasted rice, combined with milk tea creating a distinctive aroma and irresistible taste.

milk-tea-6.title: Matcha Milk Tea
milk-tea-6.description: Slight bitterness of Japanese green tea powder combined with milk creates a delicious, refreshing taste.

milk-tea-7.title: Chocolate Milk Tea
milk-tea-7.description: Harmonious combination of chocolate bitterness and sweet creamy milk, creating a rich, delicious drink.

milk-tea-8.title: Strawberry Milk Tea
milk-tea-8.description: Sweet taste of strawberries combined with creamy milk tea, creating a delicious drink with eye-catching colors.

milk-tea-9.title: Jasmine Milk Tea
milk-tea-9.description: Milk tea with jasmine tea, creating a fragrant and refreshing drink.

must-try-1.title: Avocado Smoothie
must-try-1.description: Nutritious drink made from fresh blended avocado, creamy and cool, good for health.

must-try-2.title: Mango Smoothie
must-try-2.description: Sweet and refreshing taste of ripe mango, blended with ice creating a perfect cooling drink for summer.

must-try-3.title: Crushed Milo
must-try-3.description: Familiar drink with distinctive Milo chocolate malt flavor, combined with crushed ice for refreshment.

must-try-4.title: Tamarind Ice & Arenga Pinnata
must-try-4.description: Sweet and sour taste of tamarind, combined with chewy arenga pinnata, creating a perfect thirst-quenching drink.

must-try-5.title: Aloe Vera Chia Seeds
must-try-5.description: Refreshing drink with crunchy aloe vera and nutritious chia seeds, effective for cooling down.

must-try-6.title: Matcha Latte
must-try-6.description: Harmonious combination of Japanese green tea powder and fresh milk, creating a delicious and refreshing drink.

tea-1.title: Ginger Tea
tea-1.description: Warm drink made from tea and fresh ginger, helps keep body warm and healthy, especially in cold weather.

tea-2.title: Kumquat Tea
tea-2.description: Fresh taste of kumquat combined with mild tea astringency, creating an effective thirst-quenching drink.

tea-3.title: Lemon Tea
tea-3.description: Popular refreshing drink with lemon sourness and mild tea astringency, easy to drink and aromatic.

tea-4.title: Fruit Tea
tea-4.description: Perfect combination of tea and various fresh fruits, creating a colorful and flavorful drink.

tea-5.title: Soursop Tea
tea-5.description: Sweet taste of soursop combined with tea creates a refreshing and pleasant drink.

tea-6.title: Peach Preserved Plum Orange Lemongrass Tea
tea-6.description: Unique flavor from combination of tea, peach, preserved plum, orange and lemongrass, creating a refreshing drink with balanced sweet and sour taste.

tea-7.title: Lychee Tea
tea-7.description: Sweet taste of lychee combined with tea creates a refreshing drink, perfect for summer days.

juices-1.title: Pineapple Juice
juices-1.description: Sweet and refreshing taste of fresh pineapple, rich in vitamin C and enzymes good for digestion.

juices-2.title: Orange Juice
juices-2.description: Natural sweet and sour taste of fresh oranges, rich in vitamin C, helps boost immunity.

juices-3.title: Watermelon Juice
juices-3.description: Cool drink from fresh watermelon, rich in water and antioxidants, effective for cooling down.

juices-4.title: Celery Juice
juices-4.description: Refreshing and nutritious drink from fresh celery, rich in fiber and vitamins.

juices-5.title: Pennywort Mung Bean Juice
juices-5.description: Refreshing and nutritious drink from pennywort and mung beans, effective for cooling down and skin beauty.

juices-6.title: Passion Fruit Juice
juices-6.description: Distinctive sour taste of passion fruit combined with sugar creates a sweet and sour, thirst-quenching drink.

juices-7.title: Lemon Juice
juices-7.description: Classic refreshing drink with fresh lemon's cool and sour taste.

yogurt-1.title: Fruit Yogurt
yogurt-1.description: Fresh yogurt combined with various fresh fruits, creating a delicious and nutritious flavor.

yogurt-2.title: Blueberry Yogurt
yogurt-2.description: Perfect combination of creamy yogurt and sweet-sour blueberries, rich in antioxidants.

yogurt-3.title: Strawberry Yogurt
yogurt-3.description: Sweet and sour taste of strawberries combined with fresh yogurt, creating a delicious drink, perfect for summer.

yogurt-4.title: Peach Yogurt
yogurt-4.description: Sweet taste of peach combined with fresh yogurt, creating a delicious and attractive flavor.

yogurt-5.title: Jackfruit Yogurt
yogurt-5.description: Distinctive sweet taste of jackfruit combined with fresh yogurt, creating a unique and delicious flavor.

yogurt-6.title: Cr√®me Caramel
yogurt-6.description: Creamy dessert with sweet caramel flavor, smooth and melts in your mouth.

yogurt-7.title: Assorted Panna Cotta
yogurt-7.description: Italian dessert with smooth cream texture, topped with delicious fruit sauce.
